data.name: duplicated_attribute_name
data.value: The attribute name '{0}' is duplicated for [ForAttribute] attributes on constructor parameter(s): {1}.

data.name: duplicated_ForText
data.value: A constructor must not have two or more parameters attributed with [ForText]: {0}.

data.name: must_be_annotated_with_ForElement
data.value: The class must be attributed with [ForElement].

data.name: must_not_be_interface
data.value: The type attributed with [ForElement] must be a class, not an interface.

data.name: type_mismatch_ForAttribute
data.value: The type of a constructor parameter attributed with [ForAttribute] must be string? or BindResult<string>?: {0}.

data.name: type_mismatch_ForText
data.value: The type of a constructor parameter attributed with [ForText] must be string or BindResult<string>: {0}.

data.name: error
data.value: Error

data.name: warning
data.value: Warning

data.name: parameter_must_be_annotated_with_attributes_for_child_elements
data.value: A constructor parameter for a child element or text must be attributed with [Required], [Optional], [Multiple], or [ForText]: {0}.

data.name: must_have_one_valid_constructor
data.value: The class must have exactly one constructor that is not attributed with [Ignored].

data.name: parameter_type_must_be_annotated_with_ForElement
data.value: The type of constructor parameter(s) {0} must be a class attributed with [ForElement].

data.name: parameters_must_not_be_mixed
data.value: A constructor must not mix parameters attributed with [ForText] ({0}) and parameters attributed with [Required], [Optional], or [Multiple] ({1}).

data.name: parameters_with_ForAttribute_must_be_listed_consecutively_at_the_beginning
data.value: Constructor parameters attributed with [ForAttribute] must appear consecutively at the beginning of the parameter list. Misplaced parameter(s): {0}.

data.name: parameter_must_not_be_annotated_with_both_ForText_and_another
data.value: A constructor parameter must not be attributed with both [ForText] and another Oxbind binding attribute (e.g., [Required]): {0}.

data.name: parameter_for_child_elements_must_be_mutually_exclusive
data.value: A constructor parameter must not be attributed with two or more of the following mutually exclusive attributes: [Required], [Optional], [Multiple]. Parameter: {0}.

data.name: parameter_type_must_be_IEnumerableT
data.value: A constructor parameter attributed with [Multiple] must be of type IEnumerable<T> (or IEnumerable<BindResult<T>>): {0}.

data.name: parameter_type_must_not_be_IEnumerableT
data.value: A constructor parameter not attributed with [Multiple] (e.g., [Required], [Optional]) must not be of type IEnumerable<T>: {0}.

data.name: multiple_parameter_followed_by_the_one_that_has_the_same_element_name
data.value: A [Multiple] parameter for element '{0}' must not be followed by another parameter for the same element name: {1}.

data.name: optional_parameter_followed_by_the_one_that_has_the_same_element_name
data.value: An [Optional] parameter for element '{0}' must not be followed by a [Required] or [Multiple] parameter for the same element name: {1}.

data.name: parameter_must_be_annotated_with_ForChildElement
data.value: A constructor parameter for a string child element must be annotated with [ForChildElement]: {0}.

data.name: parameter_must_not_be_annotated_with_both_ForAttribute_and_another
data.value: A constructor parameter must not be attributed with both [ForAttribute] and another Oxbind binding attribute (e.g., [Required], [ForText]): {0}.

data.name: innermost_type_of_the_ForChildElement_parameter_must_be_string
data.value: The type of a constructor parameter attributed with [ForChildElement] must be string, BindResult<string>, or an IEnumerable of these types: {0}.
